content.text: Gloria was a famous singer. She was born in the U.S. but she had Mexican roots. Her first language was English, but she knew how to sing in Spanish as if she was a native speaker. When she was a kid, she used to pretend she had a band with her siblings, and eventually, she did.
content.name: K6fh

content.text: Gloria began her career when she was quite young, but people could tell she was going to be a great star! She connected with the audience and it was easy for her to make them feel was she was feeling through her songs.
content.name: 0Cnf

content.text: Gloria had a lot of fans, and unfortunately, one of them was obsessed with her person, her lifestyle and fame. So, she pretended to be her friend and gained her trust.
content.name: lYmj

content.text: One day, the dangerous fan got into a fight with Gloria, and after some violence, she shot her. Gloria died almost immediately, which was extremely sad for her family, friends and fans. Gloria was a great person and artist and that is how she should be remembered. Sometimes bad things happen to good people, and this is one of those stories.
